actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 STR save or be knocked prone. 364

special_abilities.name: Heightened Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The mastiff's Perception is 16 when perceiving by hearing or smell.
